summary: Seven socio-economically successful women around the age of fifty come together in France for their annual multi-day bike ride.
cast: Monique van de Ven|Jacqueline Blom|Renée Fokker|Wivineke van Groningen|Raymonde de Kuyper|Lineke Rijxman|Sylvia Poorta|Gijs Scholten van Aschat|Rudolf Lucieer|Truus te Selle|Dic van Duin|Paul Hoes|Gijs de Lange|Bruno Thieba|Marc Frimat|Veronique Chabarot|Jean-Marc Poullet|Christophe Thébault|Ad Knippels|Kristen Denkers|Marc Tielemans
title: Zadelpijn
